services.description1: For backend development, we use Java Spring Boot, and for frontend development, we use React. State management is handled with Redux Toolkit, and styling is managed with MUI and styled-components. We use both SQL and NoSQL databases.
services.description2: To achieve a fully responsive real-time design, each physical device is managed by connecting them locally via network. This method focuses on faster development.
services.description3: To create creative logic, we utilize communities and write and apply test codes through research. We strive to improve our coding skills daily through these efforts.
